title: Client Snapshot Mobile App
description: We could use an app that shows a quick snapshot of a specific client I’m about to meet. Show me relevant client notes, corporate market data, integrated with my calendar.

title: Remove client financial forms 33-S and 35-R
description: These forms are antiquated and are no longer necessary. Let’s eliminate the red tape.

title: Webinar for our Tax clients
description: Set up a webinar series focused on the Common Reporting Standard. CRS is critical for our top tier clients and we could really get great attendance

title: CyberRisk Alert System
description: Set up a repository of known cyber security threats and let clients register to receive updates and alerts in real-time

title: Give clients a searchable Deloitte M&A Index app
description: If clients have dynamic, easily searchable access to our M&A Index, they will likely leverage it more in the field. Mobilize it and they will come.
